title: The dual of an ordered set

blocks.name: codu
blocks.content: Class function defining dual orders.
blocks.origin: const class codu { ODual }

blocks.name: diff.codu.s
diff.codu.c
diff.codu.w
df-odu
blocks.content: Define the dual of an ordered structure, which replaces the order component of the structure with its reverse. See ~ odubas , ~ oduleval , and ~ oduleg for its principal properties. _EDITORIAL_: likely usable to simplify many lattice proofs, as it allows for duality arguments to be formalized; for instance ~ latmass . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: oduval
blocks.content: Value of an order dual structure. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm oduval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(c0, co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(c2))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(codu, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cple, c1))
} = {
  3eqtr4i(c0, co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(c2))), cfv(codu, c1), co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(cfv(cple, c1)))))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(codu, c1), co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(cfv(cple, c1))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, universe, codu, co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(cfv(cple, c1)))), co(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(cfv(cple, cv(hs0))))))
  oveq12d(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(cfv(cple, cv(hs0)))), c1, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(cfv(cple, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  opeq2d(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(cfv(cple, cv(hs0))), ccnv(cfv(cple, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  cnveqd(cfv(cple, cv(hs0)), cfv(cple, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cple)
  df-odu(hs0)
  ovex(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(cfv(cple, c1))))
  eqtr4d(cfv(codu, c1), co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(cfv(cple, c1)))), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  fvprc(c1, codu)
  ovprc1(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(cfv(cple, c1))))
  reldmsets()
  oveq2i(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(c2)), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(cfv(cple, c1))))
  opeq2i(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(c2), ccnv(cfv(cple, c1)))
  cnveqi(c2, cfv(cple, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(cfv(cple, c1)))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm oduval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 =(c1[sSet]<(le ` ndx), `' c2 >)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(ODual ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(le ` c1)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(c0, (c1[sSet]<(le ` ndx), `' c2 >), (ODual ` c1), (c1[sSet]<(le ` ndx), `'(le ` c1)>))
  pm2.61i((ODual ` c1)=(c1[sSet]<(le ` ndx), `'(le ` c1)>), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, universe, codu, (c1[sSet]<(le ` ndx), `'(le ` c1)>), (hs0[sSet]<(le ` ndx), `'(le ` hs0)>))
  oveq12d(hs0, csts, <(le ` ndx), `'(le ` hs0)>, c1, <(le ` ndx), `'(le ` c1)>, hs0 = c1)
  id(hs0 = c1)
  opeq2d((le ` ndx), `'(le ` hs0), `'(le ` c1), hs0 = c1)
  cnveqd((le ` hs0), (le ` c1), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, cple)
  df-odu(hs0)
  ovex(c1, csts, <(le ` ndx), `'(le ` c1)>)
  eqtr4d((ODual ` c1), (c1[sSet]<(le ` ndx), `'(le ` c1)>), emptycls, ¬¨ c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c1, codu)
  ovprc1(c1, csts, <(le ` ndx), `'(le ` c1)>)
  reldmsets()
  oveq2i(c1, csts, <(le ` ndx), `' c2 >, <(le ` ndx), `'(le ` c1)>)
  opeq2i((le ` ndx), `' c2, `'(le ` c1))
  cnveqi(c2, (le ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c((c1[sSet]<(le ` ndx), `'(le ` c1)>))
}

blocks.name: oduleval
blocks.content: Value of the less-equal relation in an order dual structure. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm oduleval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(ccnv(c0), cfv(cple, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(codu, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cple, c2))
} = {
  3eqtr4i(ccnv(c0), cfv(cple, c1), ccnv(cfv(cple, c2)), cfv(cple, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(cfv(cple, c2))))))
  pm2.61i(wceq(ccnv(cfv(cple, c2)), cfv(cple, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(cfv(cple, c2)))))), wcel(c2, universe))
  mpan2(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(ccnv(cfv(cple, c2)), cfv(cple, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(cfv(cple, c2)))))), wcel(ccnv(cfv(cple, c2)), universe))
  cnvex(cfv(cple, c2))
  fvex(cple, c2)
  setsid(c2, universe, ccnv(cfv(cple, c2)), universe, cple)
  3eqtr4a(ccnv(cfv(cple, c2)), cfv(cple, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(cfv(cple, c2))))), emptycls, cfv(cple, emptycls), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  str0(cple, cfv(cple, cnx))
  pleid()
  syl6eq(ccnv(cfv(cple, c2)), emptycls, ccnv(emptycls), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  cnveqd(cfv(cple, c2), emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  fvprc(c2, cple)
  cnv0()
  fveq2d(cple, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(cfv(cple, c2)))), emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  ovprc1(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(cfv(cple, c2))))
  reldmsets()
  cnveqi(c0, cfv(cple, c2))
  fveq2i(cple, c1, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(cfv(cple, c2)))))
  oduval(c1, c2, cfv(cple, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cple, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm oduleval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ `' c0 =(le ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(ODual ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(le ` c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(`' c0, (le ` c1), `'(le ` c2), (le `(c2[sSet]<(le ` ndx), `'(le ` c2)>)))
  pm2.61i(`'(le ` c2)=(le `(c2[sSet]<(le ` ndx), `'(le ` c2)>)), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  mpan2(c2 ‚àà ùïå, `'(le ` c2)=(le `(c2[sSet]<(le ` ndx), `'(le ` c2)>)), `'(le ` c2)‚àà ùïå)
  cnvex((le ` c2))
  fvex(cple, c2)
  setsid(c2, universe, `'(le ` c2), universe, cple)
  3eqtr4a(`'(le ` c2), (le `(c2[sSet]<(le ` ndx), `'(le ` c2)>)), emptycls, (le ` ‚àÖ), ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  str0(cple, (le ` ndx))
  pleid()
  syl6eq(`'(le ` c2), emptycls, `' ‚àÖ, ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  cnveqd((le ` c2), emptycls, ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c2, cple)
  cnv0()
  fveq2d(cple, (c2[sSet]<(le ` ndx), `'(le ` c2)>), emptycls, ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  ovprc1(c2, csts, <(le ` ndx), `'(le ` c2)>)
  reldmsets()
  cnveqi(c0, (le ` c2))
  fveq2i(cple, c1, (c2[sSet]<(le ` ndx), `'(le ` c2)>))
  oduval(c1, c2, (le ` c2))
  eqid((le ` c2))
}

blocks.content: Truth of the less-equal relation in an order dual structure. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: odubas
blocks.content: Base set of an order dual structure. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm odubas(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(codu, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
} = {
  3eqtr4i(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(cfv(cple, c2))))))
  setsnid(cbs, c2, cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(cfv(cple, c2)))
  baseid()
  mpbir(wne(cfv(cbs, cnx), cfv(cple, cnx)), wne(nat1, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  ltneii(nat1, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  1re()
  1lt10()
  neeq12i(cfv(cbs, cnx), cfv(cple, cnx), nat1, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  basendx()
  plendx()
  fveq2i(cbs, c1, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(cfv(cple, c2)))))
  oduval(c1, c2, cfv(cple, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cple, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm odubas(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 =(Base ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(ODual ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(Base ` c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(c0, (Base ` c1), (Base ` c2), (Base `(c2[sSet]<(le ` ndx), `'(le ` c2)>)))
  setsnid(cbs, c2, (le ` ndx), `'(le ` c2))
  baseid()
  mpbir((Base ` ndx)‚â†(le ` ndx), 1 ‚â† cdc(1, 0))
  ltneii(nat1, cdc(1, 0))
  1re()
  1lt10()
  neeq12i((Base ` ndx), (le ` ndx), nat1, cdc(1, 0))
  basendx()
  plendx()
  fveq2i(cbs, c1, (c2[sSet]<(le ` ndx), `'(le ` c2)>))
  oduval(c1, c2, (le ` c2))
  eqid((le ` c2))
}

blocks.name: pospropd
blocks.content: Posethood is determined only by structure components and only by the value of the relation within the base set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: odupos
blocks.content: Being a poset is a self-dual property. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm odupos(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, cpo))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(codu, c0))
} = {
  isposd(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), ccnv(cfv(cple, c0)), wcel(c0, cpo))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvexi(c1, codu, c0)
  a1i(wcel(c0, cpo), wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  odubas(cfv(cbs, c0), c1, c0)
  a1i(wcel(c0, cpo), wceq(ccnv(cfv(cple, c0)), cfv(cple, c1)))
  oduleval(cfv(cple, c0), c1, c0)
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0))), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cfv(cple, c0)), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs0)))
  posref(c0, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cple, c0))
  brcnv(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs0))
  syl5bi(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cfv(cple, c0)), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(cfv(cple, c0)), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs0))))
  anbi12ci(wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cfv(cple, c0)), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(cfv(cple, c0)), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs0)))
  brcnv(cv(hs1), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs0))
  biimpd(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  posasymb(c0, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0), cv(hs1), cfv(cple, c0))
  3imtr4g(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, c0)))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cfv(cple, c0)), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(cfv(cple, c0)), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cfv(cple, c0)), cv(hs2)), wa(wbr(cv(hs2), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(hs2), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs0)))
  sylan2b(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, c0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs2), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(hs2), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs0))), w3a(wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0))))
  3anrev(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  postr(c0, cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, c0), cv(hs1), cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cple, c0))
  anbi12ci(wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cfv(cple, c0)), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(cfv(cple, c0)), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs0)))

thm odupos(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Poset ‚Üí c1 ‚àà Poset)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(ODual ` c0)
} = {
  isposd(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, (Base ` c0), `'(le ` c0), c0 ‚àà Poset)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà Poset, c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvexi(c1, codu, c0)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà Poset, (Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1))
  odubas((Base ` c0), c1, c0)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà Poset, `'(le ` c0)=(le ` c1))
  oduleval((le ` c0), c1, c0)

blocks.name: oduglb
blocks.content: Greatest lower bounds in a dual order are least upper bounds in the original order. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm oduglb(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cfv(cglb, c3)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(codu, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(club, c0))
} = {

blocks.name: odumeet
blocks.content: Meets in a dual order are joins in the original. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Jan-2015.)

thm odumeet(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(c0, cfv(cmee, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(codu, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cjn, c2))
} = {
  eqtri(c0, cfv(cmee, c1), cfv(cjn, c2))

  3eqtr4d(cfv(cjn, c2), cfv(cmee, c1), coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wbr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cfv(club, c2), cv(hs2))), coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wbr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cglb, c1), cv(hs2))), wcel(c2, universe))

  breqd(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cfv(club, c2), cv(hs2), cfv(cglb, c1), wcel(c2, universe))
  oduglb(c2, universe, cfv(club, c2), c1)
  joinfval(hs0, hs1, hs2, c2, universe, cfv(cjn, c2), cfv(club, c2))
  eqid(cfv(club, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cjn, c2))
  mp1i(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(cfv(cmee, c1), coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wbr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cglb, c1), cv(hs2)))), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvexi(c1, codu, c2)
  meetfval(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, universe, cfv(cmee, c1), cfv(cglb, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cglb, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cmee, c1))
  eqtr4d(cfv(cjn, c2), cfv(cmee, c1), emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  fvprc(c2, cjn)
  syl6eq(cfv(cmee, c1), emptycls, cfv(cmee, emptycls), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  fveq2d(cmee, c1, emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, cfv(codu, c2), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))

  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(cglb, c1))
}

blocks.name: odujoin
blocks.content: Joins in a dual order are meets in the original. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Jan-2015.)

thm odujoin(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(c0, cfv(cjn, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(codu, c2))

} = {
  eqtri(c0, cfv(cjn, c1), cfv(cmee, c2))

  oprabbidv(hs0, hs1, hs2, wcel(c2, universe), wbr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cglb, c2), cv(hs2)), wbr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cfv(club, c1), cv(hs2)))
  breqd(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cglb, c2), cv(hs2), cfv(club, c1), wcel(c2, universe))
  odulub(c2, universe, cfv(cglb, c2), c1)

  eqid(cfv(cglb, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cmee, c2))
  mp1i(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(cfv(cjn, c1), coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wbr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cfv(club, c1), cv(hs2)))), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvexi(c1, codu, c2)

  eqid(cfv(club, c1))

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà Lat ‚Üî c2 ‚àà Lat))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(ODual ` c0)
} = {
  3bitr4g(c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà Lat, c2 ‚àà Lat, (c0 ‚àà Poset ‚àß(dom((join ` c0))=((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0))‚àß dom((meet ` c0))=((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0)))), (c2 ‚àà Poset ‚àß(dom((meet ` c0))=((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0))‚àß dom((join ` c0))=((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0)))))
  anbi12d(c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà Poset, (dom((join ` c0))=((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0))‚àß dom((meet ` c0))=((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0))), c2 ‚àà Poset, (dom((meet ` c0))=((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0))‚àß dom((join ` c0))=((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0))))
  oduposb(c0, c1, c2)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà c1, ((dom((join ` c0))=((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0))‚àß dom((meet ` c0))=((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0)))‚Üî(dom((meet ` c0))=((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0))‚àß dom((join ` c0))=((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0)))))
  ancom(dom((join ` c0))=((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0)), dom((meet ` c0))=((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0)))
  islat(c0, (join ` c0), (Base ` c0), (meet ` c0))

  odubas((Base ` c0), c2, c0)

blocks.name: oduclatb
blocks.content: Being a complete lattice is self-dual. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm oduclatb(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c1, ccla))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(codu, c0))
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c1, ccla), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, ccla)
  con4i(wcel(c1, ccla), wcel(c0, universe))
  mtbiri(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c1, ccla), wcel(emptycls, ccla))
  mto(wcel(emptycls, ccla), wcel(cfv(cfv(club, emptycls), emptycls), emptycls))
  noel(cfv(cfv(club, emptycls), emptycls))
  mpan2(wcel(emptycls, ccla), wcel(cfv(cfv(club, emptycls), emptycls), emptycls), wss(emptycls, emptycls))
  ssid(emptycls)
  clatlubcl(emptycls, emptycls, emptycls, cfv(club, emptycls))
  base0()
  eqid(cfv(club, emptycls))
  eleq1d(c1, ccla, emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, cfv(codu, c0), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  fvprc(c0, codu)
  3bitr4g(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(c1, ccla), wa(wcel(c0, cpo), wa(wceq(cdm(cfv(club, c0)), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cdm(cfv(cglb, c0)), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0))))), wa(wcel(c1, cpo), wa(wceq(cdm(cfv(club, c1)), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cdm(cfv(cglb, c1)), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0))))))
  anbi12d(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, cpo), wa(wceq(cdm(cfv(club, c0)), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cdm(cfv(cglb, c0)), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)))), wcel(c1, cpo), wa(wceq(cdm(cfv(club, c1)), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cdm(cfv(cglb, c1)), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)))))
  oduposb(c0, universe, c1)
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, universe), wa(wceq(cdm(cfv(club, c0)), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cdm(cfv(cglb, c0)), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)))), wa(wceq(cdm(cfv(club, c1)), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cdm(cfv(cglb, c1)), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)))), wa(wceq(cdm(cfv(cglb, c0)), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cdm(cfv(club, c0)), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)))))
  ancom(wceq(cdm(cfv(club, c0)), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cdm(cfv(cglb, c0)), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0))))
  anbi12d(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(cdm(cfv(cglb, c0)), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cdm(cfv(club, c0)), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cdm(cfv(club, c1)), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cdm(cfv(cglb, c1)), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0))))
  eqeq1d(cdm(cfv(cglb, c0)), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cdm(cfv(club, c1)), wcel(c0, universe))
  dmeqd(cfv(cglb, c0), cfv(club, c1), wcel(c0, universe))
  odulub(c0, universe, cfv(cglb, c0), c1)
  eqeq1d(cdm(cfv(club, c0)), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cdm(cfv(cglb, c1)), wcel(c0, universe))
  dmeqd(cfv(club, c0), cfv(cglb, c1), wcel(c0, universe))
  oduglb(c0, universe, cfv(club, c0), c1)
  isclat(c0, cfv(club, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cglb, c0))
  eqid(cfv(club, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cglb, c0))
  isclat(c1, cfv(club, c1), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cglb, c1))
  odubas(cfv(cbs, c0), c1, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(club, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cglb, c1))
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà CLat ‚Üî c1 ‚àà CLat)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(ODual ` c0)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(c0 ‚àà CLat, c1 ‚àà CLat, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, ccla)
  con4i(c1 ‚àà CLat, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  mtbiri(¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà CLat, ‚àÖ ‚àà CLat)
  mto(‚àÖ ‚àà CLat, ((lub ` ‚àÖ)` ‚àÖ)‚àà ‚àÖ)
  noel(((lub ` ‚àÖ)` ‚àÖ))
  mpan2(‚àÖ ‚àà CLat, ((lub ` ‚àÖ)` ‚àÖ)‚àà ‚àÖ, ‚àÖ ‚äÜ ‚àÖ)
  ssid(emptycls)
  clatlubcl(emptycls, emptycls, emptycls, (lub ` ‚àÖ))
  base0()
  eqid((lub ` ‚àÖ))
  eleq1d(c1, ccla, emptycls, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, (ODual ` c0), ¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c0, codu)
  3bitr4g(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà CLat, c1 ‚àà CLat, (c0 ‚àà Poset ‚àß(dom((lub ` c0))= P((Base ` c0))‚àß dom((glb ` c0))= P((Base ` c0)))), (c1 ‚àà Poset ‚àß(dom((lub ` c1))= P((Base ` c0))‚àß dom((glb ` c1))= P((Base ` c0)))))
  anbi12d(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà Poset, (dom((lub ` c0))= P((Base ` c0))‚àß dom((glb ` c0))= P((Base ` c0))), c1 ‚àà Poset, (dom((lub ` c1))= P((Base ` c0))‚àß dom((glb ` c1))= P((Base ` c0))))
  oduposb(c0, universe, c1)
  syl5bb(c0 ‚àà ùïå, (dom((lub ` c0))= P((Base ` c0))‚àß dom((glb ` c0))= P((Base ` c0))), (dom((lub ` c1))= P((Base ` c0))‚àß dom((glb ` c1))= P((Base ` c0))), (dom((glb ` c0))= P((Base ` c0))‚àß dom((lub ` c0))= P((Base ` c0))))
  ancom(dom((lub ` c0))= P((Base ` c0)), dom((glb ` c0))= P((Base ` c0)))
  anbi12d(c0 ‚àà ùïå, dom((glb ` c0))= P((Base ` c0)), dom((lub ` c0))= P((Base ` c0)), dom((lub ` c1))= P((Base ` c0)), dom((glb ` c1))= P((Base ` c0)))
  eqeq1d(dom((glb ` c0)), P((Base ` c0)), dom((lub ` c1)), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  dmeqd((glb ` c0), (lub ` c1), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  odulub(c0, universe, (glb ` c0), c1)
  eqeq1d(dom((lub ` c0)), P((Base ` c0)), dom((glb ` c1)), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  dmeqd((lub ` c0), (glb ` c1), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  oduglb(c0, universe, (lub ` c0), c1)
  isclat(c0, (lub ` c0), (Base ` c0), (glb ` c0))
  eqid((lub ` c0))
  eqid((glb ` c0))
  isclat(c1, (lub ` c1), (Base ` c0), (glb ` c1))
  odubas((Base ` c0), c1, c0)
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((lub ` c1))
  eqid((glb ` c1))
}

blocks.name: poslubmo

blocks.name: posglbmo
blocks.content: Greatest lower bounds in a poset are unique if they exist. (Contributed by NM, 20-Sep-2018.)

  sylanbrc(w0, wreu(hs0, c5, wa(wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c5, wi(wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(s1)))))), wrex(hs0, c5, wa(wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c5, wi(wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(s1)))))), wrmo(hs0, c5, wa(wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c5, wi(wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(s1)))))))

  syl2anc(w0, wrmo(hs0, c5, wa(wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c5, wi(wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(s1)))))), wcel(c4, cpo), wss(c1, c5))

  breq2(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0), c3)
  ralbidv(s1, c5, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wi(wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(s1))), wi(wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), wbr(c2, c3, cv(s1))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(s1)), wbr(c2, c3, cv(s1)))

thm poslubd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)= c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(le ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(lub ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà Poset)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚äÜ c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí s0[c3]c2)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c5 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]s1))‚Üí c2[c3]s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)

  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)= c2), d(s1, c0))
  eqtrd((c0 ` c1), c2, iota(hs0 ‚àà c5,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]s1)‚Üí hs0[c3]s1)))), w0)

  biid((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]s1)‚Üí hs0[c3]s1))))
  mpbid(w0, iota(hs0 ‚àà c5,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]s1)‚Üí hs0[c3]s1))))= c2, (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]s1)‚Üí c2[c3]s1))))
  syl2anc(w0, ((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]s1)‚Üí c2[c3]s1)))‚Üî iota(hs0 ‚àà c5,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]s1)‚Üí hs0[c3]s1))))= c2), c2 ‚àà c5, ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà c5,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]s1)‚Üí hs0[c3]s1)))))
  sylanbrc(w0, ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà c5,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]s1)‚Üí hs0[c3]s1)))), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c5,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]s1)‚Üí hs0[c3]s1)))), ‚àÉ*(hs0 ‚àà c5,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]s1)‚Üí hs0[c3]s1)))))

  poslubmo(hs0, s0, s1, c4, c1, c5, c3)

  breq2(hs0, c2, s0, c3)
  ralbidv(s1, c5, hs0 = c2, (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]s1)‚Üí hs0[c3]s1), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]s1)‚Üí c2[c3]s1))
  imbi2d(hs0 = c2, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]s1), hs0[c3]s1, c2[c3]s1)
  breq1(hs0, c2, c3, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]s1)‚Üí c2[c3]s1))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: poslubdg
blocks.content: Properties which determine the least upper bound in a poset. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm poslubdg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cple, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(club, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cpo))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(cv(s0), c3, c2))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c5), wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))), wbr(c2, c3, cv(s1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2)), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2)), diffsc(s0, c5))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2)), diffsc(s1, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2)), diffsc(s1, c5))
  eqtrd(cfv(c0, c1), c2, cfv(cfv(club, c4), c1), w0)
  fveq1d(c0, c1, cfv(club, c4), w0)
  poslubd(s0, s1, cfv(club, c4), c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(cbs, c4), w0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c4))
  eqid(cfv(club, c4))
  sseqtrd(c1, cfv(cbs, c4), c5, w0)
  eleqtrd(c2, cfv(cbs, c4), c5, w0)
  syld3an2(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c4)), wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), wbr(c2, c3, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c5))
  3adant3(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c4)), wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), c5))
  biimpar(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c4)), wcel(cv(s1), c5))
  eleq2d(cv(s1), c5, cfv(cbs, c4), w0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, club, c4)
  diff.club.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c4)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, club, c4)
  diff.club.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbs, c4)
  diff.cbs.s(s1)
}

thm poslubdg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)= c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(le ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 =(Base ` c4))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 =(lub ` c4))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà Poset)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚äÜ c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí s0[c3]c2)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c5 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]s1))‚Üí c2[c3]s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)= c2), d(s0, c0))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)= c2), d(s0, c5))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)= c2), d(s1, c0))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)= c2), d(s1, c5))
  eqtrd((c0 ` c1), c2, ((lub ` c4)` c1), w0)
  fveq1d(c0, c1, (lub ` c4), w0)
  poslubd(s0, s1, (lub ` c4), c1, c2, c3, c4, (Base ` c4), w0)
  eqid((Base ` c4))
  eqid((lub ` c4))
  sseqtrd(c1, (Base ` c4), c5, w0)
  eleqtrd(c2, (Base ` c4), c5, w0)
  syld3an2(w0, s1 ‚àà(Base ` c4), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]s1), c2[c3]s1, s1 ‚àà c5)
  3adant3(w0, s1 ‚àà(Base ` c4), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c3]s1), s1 ‚àà c5)
  biimpar(w0, s1 ‚àà(Base ` c4), s1 ‚àà c5)
  eleq2d(s1, c5, (Base ` c4), w0)

  diff.cfv.s(s1, club, c4)
  diff.club.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbs, c4)
  diff.cbs.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: posglbd
blocks.content: Properties which determine the greatest lower bound in a poset. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Jan-2015.)

thm posglbd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2))

  -| wi(w0, wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c4)))

  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c5), wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)))), wbr(cv(s1), c3, c2))

} = {

  odupos(c4, cfv(codu, c4))

  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wb(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c3), c2), wbr(c2, c3, cv(s0))))
  sylancr(w0, wb(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c3), c2), wbr(c2, c3, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), universe), wcel(c2, c5))
  brcnvg(cv(s0), universe, c2, c5, c3)
  mpbird(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c5), wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c3), cv(s1)))), wbr(c2, ccnv(c3), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c3, c2))
  syl3an3b(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c5), wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c3), cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), c3, c2), wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0))))
  ralbii(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c3), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)))
  brcnv(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))
  vex(s0)
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c5), wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c3), cv(s1))), wb(wbr(c2, ccnv(c3), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c3, c2)))
  sylancl(w0, wb(wbr(c2, ccnv(c3), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c3, c2)), wcel(c2, c5), wcel(cv(s1), universe))
  vex(s1)
  brcnvg(c2, c5, cv(s1), universe, c3)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c3)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, codu, c4)
  diff.codu.s(s0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c3)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, codu, c4)

  sylancl(w0, (c2[`' c3]s1 ‚Üî s1[c3]c2), c2 ‚àà c5, s1 ‚àà ùïå)
